data.message:
Lmfoa 

Should do that *america* song where u talk shit about the government and war

replies.message: the government tells soldiers what to do, whether they like it or not, and most of the time, i didn't like it.

Yes sir, the vets are awesome
They're basically the superheroes in a sense. 

But sometimes governments make them believe their doing good when they're doing unjustifiable deeds. 

Anyways governments suck XD but it be great if em would do that song and the vets could rock out to it and then play soldier
No thanks, been there, done it, don't want to do it again.
"I shoveled shit all my life, and now I'm dumping it". Love that song!  Freedom of speech all the way!
